com.example.denis.myapplication

Interface IDetector

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFaceLocator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CVFaceDetector, GmsFaceDetector, OpenCvFaceDetector

    public interface IDetector
    Created by vasil on 11.10.2015. This interface contains methods essential for face detection OpenCV detector and API detector must implement this interface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void detect()
      Method is called after void setCameraFrame(Mat mat); to detect all faces
      int getFacesCount()
      Method returns number of recognised faces
      Rect getNearestFaceRectangle()
      Must return the biggest face rectangle avaliable or null, if no faces were detected
      void setAbsoluteFaceSize(int size)
      Used to set face size for detector to work properly
      void setCameraFrame(Mat mat)
      Method called for every frame to set up a picture for detector

    • Method Detail

      • setCameraFrame

        void setCameraFrame(Mat mat)
        Method called for every frame to set up a picture for detector

      • detect

        void detect()
        Method is called after void setCameraFrame(Mat mat); to detect all faces

      • getFacesCount

        int getFacesCount()
        Method returns number of recognised faces

      • getNearestFaceRectangle

        Rect getNearestFaceRectangle()
        Must return the biggest face rectangle avaliable or null, if no faces were detected

      • setAbsoluteFaceSize

        void setAbsoluteFaceSize(int size)
        Used to set face size for detector to work properly
